channel.title: debugger on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in debugger on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Bomb lab
item.description: sample bomb http://csapp.cs.cmu.edu/3e/labs.html name list (nm), strings, objdump nm bomb strings objdump start gdb in gui mode gdb -tui bomb https://sourceware.org/gdb/current/onlinedocs/gdb/TUI-Keys.html#TUI-Keys Keyboard shortcut C-x a : enter or leave TUI mode C-x 1 : one window C-x 2 : two windows also cycles through different layouts C-x o : ‘other’ C-l : refresh Navication up, down, left, right, pgup, pgdown
